definition: become bubbly or frothy or foaming, a mass of small bubbles formed in or on a liquid
details:
verb
- become bubbly or frothy or foaming
= example: become bubbly or frothy or foaming
= synonyms: sparkle
- exude or expel foam
= example: exude or expel foam
- make froth or foam and become bubbly
= synonyms: suds
noun
- a mass of small bubbles formed in or on a liquid
= synonyms: foam
